section.37: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Az-Zinad that:The Messenger of Allah [SAW] had the (hands and feet) of those who drove off his camels cut off, and their eyes gouged out with fire. Allah rebuked him for that, and Allah, Most High, revealed the entire verse: "The recompense of those who wage war against Allah and His Messenger
